unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi reported a spike in neurology cases this week, particularly among the under-40s. Dr. Rajesh Kumar, HOD of Neurology, mentioned that they've seen a 25% increase in patients complaining of severe headaches and dizziness. Apparently, many cases seem linked to increased screen time and stress. One worrying trend is the rise in young adults experiencing symptoms usually associated with older age groups, like memory lapses.
